name: Yenelis Halfelven
url: pfsrd://NPC Codex/Rules/Prestige Class NPCs/Pathfinder Chronicler/Pathfinder Chroniclers/Master Storycrafter/Yenelis Halfelven

sections.body: Story is everything to Yenelis Halfelven. She yearns to craft the most amazing story of her generation, but such a story cannot be a mere fiction—it must be based in fact. She travels with promising adventurers, hoping their deeds will spark her perfect story, but so far has always been disappointed.
At first, Yenelis only observed the adventurers she traveled with, but now she aids them, hoping her abilities can push them in the right direction.
Yenelis scours taverns and pubs, looking for the group that will finally give her the perfect story.
